applicationSubmittedText1: We have sent you a confirmation email to welsh
applicationSubmittedHeading1: Helpwch ni i wella'r gwasanaeth hwn
applicationSubmittedLink1: Cwblhewch ein harolwg cyflym (yn agor mewn tab newydd)
applicationSubmittedText4: We'll send an email to welsh
applicationSubmittedText5: to let you know if your application to register an authorised agent has been accepted or rejected. welsh
applicationSubmittedText6: We'll process the application as soon as possible. This is a new service, so we're not able to tell you exactly how long this will take. welsh
applicationSubmittedHeading4: If the application is accepted welsh
applicationSubmittedText7: We'll register your business as an authorised agent and create an authorised agent account. You'll be able to to access the authorised agent account when you sign in to your Companies House account. welsh
applicationSubmittedText9: to find out how to manage the agent account, including how to add other users. welsh
applicationSubmittedHeading5: If the application is rejected welsh
applicationSubmittedText10: We'll explain why your application has been rejected and what you can do next. welsh
